[3] 	The elevator door opens. The Guard turns around. The 	elevator is empty.  
[4] 	The elevator door opens. It's empty.  	SEBASTIAN'S POV - as we push past the guard and down onto 	the street.  
[5] 	Linda and Matt exit their car and cross toward the 	elevator.  
[6] 	As we watch the footsteps head back through the puddles 	toward the warehouse, we see Frank pass us in his car.  
[7] 	Linda and Matt stumble out into the blazing sunshine. 	Emergency crews close from all directions, sirens 	roaring. A trail of smoke drifts higher and higher into 	the sky.  	An ambulance pulls up next to them and the paramedics hop 	out, immediately putting a blanket around her and 	treating Matt's wounds.
